Package uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hadoop

Package containing MapReduce jobs and helper classes for processing the datasets.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoWritable
    Acts as a base class for any Writable.
    DosJob
    Encapsulates the Map and Reduce jobs for the DoS attack threat analysis.
    DosJob.DoSAttack  
    DosJob.Map1
    The first map job takes text and produces a FlowRecord if the particular flow is suspicious.
    DosJob.Map2
    The second map job creates a key that represents the minute timestamp and the destination address of the attack.
    DosJob.Reduce1
    The first reduce job combines all flows with the same key and aggregates the appropriate fields.
    DosJob.Reduce2
    The second reduce job collects the data for the same key.
    FlowRecord
    A class which acts as a container for information about a flow.
    IP
    A Writable for representing an IPv4 address.
    JobBase
    Base class to get and run jobs in Hadoop.
    RunJobs
    This is the main Java class which is run for each router when we receive netflow data.
    ScanningJob
    Class encapsulating the Mappers, Reducers, the appropriate data structure classes, and an interface to run the job.
    ScanningJob.Map1
    The first map job takes in the input from csv files, converts it into PortScan and collects on sourceIP,timeframe(x,startTime),destIP,destPort, where x is 10, 60, 300.
    ScanningJob.MapI
    The Map job used further down the pipeline, which is an identity map which converts BytesWritable to PortScanKey and PortScan.
    ScanningJob.PortScan
    A construct used to hold a port scan's data.
    ScanningJob.PortScanKey
    The key for a given port scan for HBase storage.
    ScanningJob.Reduce1
    The first reduce job combines the different flows with the same key and aggregates the appropriate fields.
    ScanningJob.Reduce2
    The second reduce job counts the number of different ports used for a single source address.
    ScanningJob.Reduce3
    The third reduce job counts the number of different destination IP addresses for a single source address.
    SerializationUtils
    A class which provides several serialisation related helper methods
    SingleFlowJob  
    SingleFlowJob.Map
    The mapper will determine the potential attack type (if any) for each flow and then will aggregate on attackType and destination IP.
    SingleFlowJob.Reduce
    The reducer will do a single traversal of the set of flows associated with each potential attack and record the relevant statistics.
    StatisticsJob
    Mapper and Reducer used to generate statistics for a given router over a given timeframe.
    StatisticsJob.Map  
    StatisticsJob.Reduce  

Package uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hadoop Description

Package containing MapReduce jobs and helper classes for processing the datasets.
See Also:
